welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Meridianville, a charming and picturesque town known for its friendly locals and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

airports.airport_name: Huntsville International - Carl T. Jones Field

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Huntsville International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Huntsville International Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
